description: Coefficients in expansion of Sum_{k=0..inf} Prod_{j=1..k} (1-x^j) about x = -1.
links: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..250
formula: a(n) ~ sqrt(12) * exp(Pi^2/48) * 24^(n+1) * n^(n+1) / (exp(n) * Pi^(2*n+2)). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, May 04 2014
author: _Bill Gosper_, Aug 19 2001
